participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, often lost in deep reflections about art and music.
participant_1.background: one of the languages that i'm currently studying is spanish. i am a musician. my next language to study is french. i also study languages. my favorite spanish word is trabajo.

participant_2.name: Emily

participant_2.background: my brother is older than me. i hate math class. i ride the bus to school. i'm on the soccer team. i am 13 years old.

content.text: In Mozart, I see a reflection of the inner beauty of the universe.
